title: The Chimera Vector ebook [technothriller] (Fifth Column #1)
description:
The Chimera Vector - technothriller (ebook)

#1 AMAZON BESTSELLER
#1 Bestseller - Apple iBookstore
#2 Bestseller - Kobo
#3 Bestseller - Google Play

"This fast-paced action yarn ticks all the boxes of the genre: great fight sequences, improbable technology, global conspiracy--and double cross after double cross. The debut of up-and-coming writer Nathan Farrugia, it stars a highly trained assassin named Sophia who works for a shadowy organization that seeks complete control of world events and media. After a botched operation in Iran, it quickly becomes clear that Sophia and her associates are tools in a dangerous game of subversive warfare. When she goes rogue, the chase is on ... and when it finally roared across the finish line, we felt like we'd been holding our breath the whole way."
-Apple iBookstore - Best Thriller of 2012

The Fifth Column: the worldÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s most powerful and secretive organization. They run our militaries. They run our governments. They run our terrorist cells.

Recruited as a child, Sophia is a deniable operative for the Fifth Column. Like all operatives, SophiaÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s DNA has been altered to augment her senses and her mind is splintered into programmed subsets.

On a routine mission in Iran something goes catastrophically wrong. Bugs are beginning to appear in SophiaÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s programming and the mission spins out of control.

High-speed chases, gun fights, helicopter battles, immortal psychopaths, super soldiers and mutant abilities are all in the mix in this edge-of-your-seat action-packed techno-thriller.

Perfect for fans of Matthew Reilly, THE CHIMERA VECTOR melds sci-fi with sizzling espionage action.
